thread.title: Woody Harrelson in Early Talks to Be Han Solo's New Mentor: Report
thread.title_full: Woody Harrelson in Early Talks to Be Han Solo's New Mentor: Report

author: Katharine Trendacosta on io9, shared by Cheryl Eddy to Gizmodo
title: Woody Harrelson in Early Talks to Be Han Solo's New Mentor: Report
text:
Go to permalink Image: War for the Planet of the Apes, 20th Century Fox 
Variety has sources saying that Woody Harrelson is in the early stages of negotiation to play the mentor of Han Solo (Alden Ehrenreich) in the next standalone Star Wars movie. Advertisement 
There’s no more information than that available, but we do know that Donald Glover will be playing Lando Calrissian and Emilia Clarke will be the love interest. My question is: will Harrelson’s mentor teach smuggling or thieving, since the new Star Wars canon got rid of the story that Han once attended the Imperial Academy? Both the old and new canon do have him being orphaned at a young age and taking up thieving. 
Harrelson could be the Space Fagin to Ehrehreich’s space Oliver Twist. That would be one direction to take, I guess. The Han Solo film is due in 2018 from directors Phil Lord and Chris Miller.
